title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.31 - Restoration after jury disagreement, mistrial or order for new trial
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.31 - Restoration after jury disagreement, mistrial or order for new trial

State Regulations

An action in which there has been an inability
by a jury to reach a verdict, a mistrial or a new trial granted by the trial
judge or an appellate court shall be rescheduled for trial. Where a new trial
is granted by an appellate court, a notice to reschedule shall be filed with
the appropriate clerk. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22

210.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
